meanings.definition: The evolutionary development and diversification of plants.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study phytogenies to understand how plants have changed over time.
meanings.sent2: Botanists use phytogenies to trace the history of different plant species.
meanings.sent3: Learning about phytogenies can be like solving a puzzle about plant evolution.
meanings.sent4: The phytogenies of plants are like a roadmap showing their journey through time.
meanings.sent5: Exploring phytogenies brings the fascinating story of plant evolution to life.

meanings.definition: The study of the evolutionary history of plants.
meanings.sent1: In class, we learned about phytogenies and how plants have evolved.
meanings.sent2: Botanists rely on phytogenies to understand the past of plant species.
meanings.sent3: Sometimes, studying phytogenies feels like going on a plant history adventure.
meanings.sent4: The phytogenies of plants reveal the secrets of their ancient past.
meanings.sent5: Exploring phytogenies helps us uncover the mysteries of plant evolution.
